name: Five Nights at Tootle's
description:
FNAT is a fnaf fangame that you need to survive the traditional five nights.  Be careful tho, as you need fast hands to wear the shnixel head. (Q to wear, E to unwear) Monitor Tootles in the security cameras (SPACE to close). I do not own the music. Game inspired from Scott Cawthon's FNAF. Get the GameJolt alternate here: http://gamejolt.com/games/FNATTheGame/276589

Visit our Facebook page: https://web.facebook.com/DoodleGames2017/

And don't forget, have fun while playing!
